plugin.name: joda-time
plugin.author: Rob Fletcher
plugin.title: Joda-Time Plugin
plugin.description: \ The Joda-Time Plugin integrates the Joda Time date/time library into Grails. The plugin includes the Joda Time library as well as classes for Hibernate persistence. Binding support is included so that you can bind from form inputs to Joda Time fields on domain or command objects.
